title: Why do these players go unpunished?
body:
You guys are probably sick of hearing these kinds of posts here. But I'm done, absolutely done with this. 

What's with these false promises in the loading screen like "You can report players with unwanted behavior after the match" and "The Tribunal has punished and reformed x-thousand player" etc etc. Does the report system even work?

Ever since I started playing (which is like, a few years ago, though I only started taking the game seriously this January so that will be the reference point here), I cannot go for 5 matches straight without having someone that instalocks, takes a role that someone else already called, some that calls you a retard even though he's an adc that's like 1/9 in lane as miss fortune. At first I sorta tolerated it, I didn't let it get into my head and tried to not tilt for the match and just report them afterwards.

But pretty recently there are just a really high amount of toxicity in the community.

Just last night I got flamed by a Jinx because he died when the enemy midlaner roamed to bot and killed him, even though I pinged the he was missing. He even called me a retard for not following a roaming midlaner. Then mid-March I had a Blitzcrank call support in champ select but went toplane, and our Illaoi started feeding because he didn't want to share his lane.

But to be honest, they're not even the worst kinds of players here.

(Warning, judging from the type of people that exists in the internet nowadays that get offended with every singe thing in existence, the next part might be offensive so proceed with caution)

The absolute worst kind of players are the Chinese players I tend to get queued up. Now I have nothing against China, or its people, just the Chinese toxic lol players. Not trying to be racist or anything.

Not only do they do all the things I've stated above but the fact that they don't speak English already makes them terrible.

I got queued with a master yi just a few minutes ago and I got so annoyed that I just had to make this post here. He calls us an idiot, even though he didn't call a role in champ select and chose smite even though we had a lee sin jungle. And spent the entire match roaming around getting killed and ksing us during clashes and spam the chat with Chinese letters and the devil's number. He even went in the match with no masteries. And just a few weeks ago I got queued with a Draven who didn't really spam chat or anything but he intentionally fed and type :D every time he dies, which is a lot. i don't want to state specific names but if I have to, I have them all on my block list.

And in all seriousness why are these players even here? Now I admit I live in Asia myself I'm like right above Australia. But I acted like one who belongs here, I communicated in English because I speak it well (this is sorta out of topic here but a few days ago I was playing Lux and typed in chat "I should've rushed zhonya's" then someone corrected me "it's should of not should've", come on guys.. srsly) And these sort of players not only ruin the game but ruin the image of the people they represent, kinda like what happened on my view of them. I'm really annoyed earlier since I'm on sort of a IP hoard since I'm trying to buy champions (ehem, {{champion:92}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:91}} ) that's why I'm hoping someone in the higher ups would do something about this.

And before you comment something like "stop whining it's just solo q norms" well that would be a valid statement, although I even get this experience in ranked, I even played bots to try out a new champion and I still encounter these.

And speaking of bots have you guys experienced playing bots and you get queued with names like 072 Robert or something like that, like what are those things? Even in norms there are bots that go all mid with no masteries and using only rotation champions. I assume they're from the websites that sell level 30 accounts or something idk. Luckily they're always on the enemy team. I would enjoy playing against them but the people I get queued with wants to end the match quickly because they have "pride" and want to get better playing a real game rather than get boosted by an intentionally thrown match, like seriously.... 

So that concludes it pretty much, really wish reporting actually does something in this game, at least make it something like, we won't get queued with someone if we report them or something along those lines. Or maybe it already does and I just haven't noticed it.

replies.body: When someone fails to call for a role and someone auto locks and arguments start, you're better off dodging the game
Yeah, But I can only do that for a few times until that bullshit system bans me for dodging too many matches, they need to remove it seriously
If you are comfortable that you are doing your job just mute and move on. If you are doing your job you will climb. If you're not, you wont.

Doesn't matter how well you do 'your job', since your job needs to include carrying 4 potatoes.

You can defend your lane all day, ping as much as you want, hell you can even roam, but unless you not only beat your lane AND stop your opponent from roaming or getting kills, you are never good enough for some people.

Plus, even if you win your lane and stop your opponent, whose to say the other 2 lanes, or the jungler, or 3 lanes if you are the jungler, don't end up fucking up?

It happens regular enough that all you can really do is win your lane and pray.

> It happens regular enough that all you can really do is win your lane and pray.

Thats kindof what I am saying.

There is no guarantee you will win any game. but if you get potatoes on your team, there is an equal chance that the other team will have the same or worse potatoes next game. Win some, lose some. But as long as you do your best, critically evaluate yourself, and aim to improve, you will eventually land where you're supposed to land (whether that is challenger or bronze 2)

For some reason I seem to get more potatoes than the enemy, and I am not joking when I say that.

Just look at my last game, I decided to rank top for shits and giggles with Malzahar. 20 minutes in I was still sitting defending against Malphite (who had like 5 ganks at that point to my none) at the FIRST tower, in the meantime my so called team had lost both their inhibitors.

Now tell me, what the fuck can I do when that shit happens regularly? 20 minutes in a 4v4 situation, not even since my Jungle never came top and theirs did, and lost 2 inhibitors. I was 0/3 and my team was giving me shit for 'feeding' and Braum stating he was playing better then me when they had lost 2 inhibitors, that is the shit I get regularly.

I don't play hard carries, I play for a team role, I play to defend and not give away 6 kills in 10 minutes to the enemy ADC, but I get players who think they are super heroes and just fail.

So why weren't you helping your team? If you're sitting top while the enemy pushes to your inhibs then that's a red flag to me. You're abandoning you team to odds they clearly couldn't win against, when you could at least use your ult to lock down a carry.

Inhibs > First tier turrets. You should have been with your team, not sitting top lane lamenting at how bad they are. Maybe the Braum was playing badly, but you weren't playing at all.

> I don't play hard carries, I play for a team role

And yet you do not seem to play with the team. A team role is useless if you don't use it, it's more useless than an underfed carry because at least they can still do a little. Sitting top in a 'team role' while YOU, not 'your team' YOU in the plural sense lose inhibs does nothing for the game, and only gets you further away from their nexus.

ADC had seven kills in 11 minutes and a tower, I was still top lane defending my lane, WTF am I supposed to do? With someone that fed it would have been pointless to even try, my team wouldn't even do enough damage to kill their ADC, or anyone on their team no matter if I locked one down or not.

I saw a post of yours on forums a while back where you were unhappy about team mates. I even added you off that. Maybe if you had have accepted even one of my many game invites you may have found a whole new bunch of nonToxic, nonRetard, nonPotato people to pay with... but you chose NOT to.
Seems like a pattern showing up here - you doing a lot of NOT doing anything proactive to make your gaming experience better... like NOT accepting game invites from people who reach out to you and try and include you in their group of friends and you NOT even trying to better your teams situation while still bitching about their antics. 
What are you NOT going to do next..?

I am not always at my computer to accept game invites, I don't sit here like a robot like some people do.

And considering you are NOT on my friends list anymore only tells me one thing, you are not actually that good a player and therefore I removed you.

I will give players a chance to join games with, however if they play worse than me, I remove them. Too many times over the years I have had players who thought they could be good, not be toxic, not be potatoes or whatever, but suck balls, bad, and I remove them.

No actually, I removed you as I didn't see the point of having you on my friendslist if you couldn't be fucked accepting even one of the many game invites I sent you.

My charity and goodwill only stretches so far, then I walk.

well to be honest I would not use a top malz shits and giggles game as a good benchmark. for one, you are not doing your "meta" job, and unless you can legitimately destroy with an off meta pick, you give your team 2 mages, one who is useless @ 0/3 and one mid, and you leave the team without a tank. In that instance, holding your lane is not doing your job.

Actually we agreed for a tank to go mid, and he done as good a job in mid as I did top. We managed to defend quite late considering the issue was that bot lane fed so hard there was nothing we could do to win.

Ever since pre season started all the trolls and rubbish players are out in force. In all honesty I'm yet to have 1 game (that's right 1 single fkn game) where my team plays properly or we don't have 1 troll. It's becoming amusing honestly. People not taking keystones or masteries, intent feeding, using retarded builds like an AP adc... it just goes on. Not saying people can't do it, but most of the time they only do it to troll and generally be fkwits. This games honestly just one big joke in it's current state.

I just want SoloQ to be back up and hopefully have a better experience then. If not i'll be uninstalling and playing other major titles that have recently been released. Because there is certainly nothing appealing about Lol as of right now that's for sure!

That life, get used to it. Not everyone is gonna be nice and pleasant to deal with. There'll always be those who will try and get what they want by insta-locking etc. You're just gonna have to deal with it. Also, keep in mind that this sort of thing happens a lot more frequently in normal Q than in ranked, since most people who play normals don't really care about this sort of thing and are just there to have some casual fun. My advice? If someone instalocks a role that you wanted, just pick a different role. If someone's being toxic or trash talking, just mute them and move on. Remember, its just a game, an online game to be exact, which means there's all types of different people within the community including both toxic players as well as pleasant, team players. If you want a more serious environment, consider playing ranked.
well for a start 'Should've' was correct as 'should of' isn't proper grammar, but i get the feels man, i feel like i cant play 3 games straight without someone ruining the game

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Crystal+V just played with this guys. idc what the "name and shame" policy is but this guy is a troll and should be exposed just look. if she gives first blood she just laughs runs around and feeds doesn't even help and this is not only me saying this
